mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe (rcp_writer, rcp_title, rcp_content, serving_size, cooking_time, cooking_level, cooking_order, rcp_viewCount, rcp_regdate, main_org_name, main_save_name, main_path) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{servingSize}, #{cookingTime}, #{cookingLevel}, #{cookingOrder}, #{viewCount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{mainOrgName}, #{mainSaveName}, #{mainPath})
mapper.select:
SELECT rcp_num AS rcpNum, rcp_writer AS writer, rcp_title AS title, main_org_name AS mainOrgName, main_save_name AS mainSaveName, main_path AS mainPath FROM recipe
ORDER BY rcp_num DESC

SELECT r.rcp_num AS rcpNum, r.rcp_writer AS writer, r.rcp_title AS title, r.rcp_content AS content, r.serving_size AS servingSize, r.cooking_time AS cookingTime, r.cooking_level AS cookingLevel, r.cooking_order AS cookingOrder, r.rcp_viewCount AS viewCount, r.rcp_regdate AS regdate, r.main_org_name AS mainOrgName, r.main_save_name AS mainSaveName, r.main_path AS mainPath FROM recipe AS r WHERE r.rcp_num=#{rcpNum}
